SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.security.credential.config

Interface PkiCredentialConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties, PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties
public interface PkiCredentialConfiguration
Configuration interface for configuring a stand-alone PkiCredential.

Note: One, and exactly one, of bundle(), jks() or pem() must be supplied.

Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<String>
    bundle()
    Pointer to a PkiCredential accessible via the CredentialBundles bean/interface.
    Optional<StoreCredentialConfiguration>
    jks()
    Configuration for a JKS (Java KeyStore) based credential.
    Optional<PemCredentialConfiguration>
    pem()
    Configuration for a PEM-based credential.
